Blog: articles for general audiences

The following articles are catered to a general audience interested in (renewable) energy. I write about themes that are popular in the media or that I get asked about a lot.

  • Why renewables are difficult: challenges of making 100% renewable electricity systems and possible solutions.

  • What’s the deal with nuclear?: advantages and disadvantages of nuclear power in the energy transition and why it’s so controversial.

  • How renewable are renewables really?: clean energy’s material requirements, the effect on the energy transition and possible solutions. Co-authored with Mariana Clare.
